languages.text:
Flows of the Immaterium cause an enemy ship to immediately turn 45 or 90 degrees depending on the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g}. If the enemy ship has suffered {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this abrupt turn additionally deals damage equal to <u>(from 25 to 30)</u>% of the ship's missing hull for a 45-degree turn and deals that damage twice for a 90-degree turn.
<indent=5%>Does not affect ships larger than cruisers.</indent>
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Потоки Имматериума заставляют вражеских корабль повернуться на 45 или 90 градусов в зависимости от маневренности корабля. Если внутренняя структура корабля повреждена, этот резкий поворот наносит дополнительный урон, равный 25–30% от полученного урона, а если поворот был на 90 градусов, то процент дополнительного урона возрастает в два раза.
<indent=5%>Не действует на корабли, класс которых превышает крейсерский.</indent>
<indent=5%>Восстановление: случайное, 1–3 раунда.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Flows of the Immaterium cause an enemy ship to immediately turn 45 or 90 degrees depending on the ship's manoeuvrability. If the enemy ship has suffered hull damage, this abrupt turn additionally deals damage equal to 25-30% of the ship's missing hull for 45-degree turns and deals that damage twice for 90-degree turns.
<indent=5%>Does not affect ships larger then cruisers.</indent>
<indent=5%>Cooldown: 1-3 rounds at random.</indent>

Flows of the Immaterium cause an enemy ship to immediately turn 45 or 90 degrees depending on the ship's manoeuvrability. If the enemy ship has suffered hull damage, this abrupt turn additionally deals damage equal to 25-30% of the ship's missing hull for a 45-degree turn and deals that damage twice for a 90-degree turn.
<indent=5%>Does not affect ships larger then cruisers.</indent>
<indent=5%>Cooldown: 1-3 rounds at random.</indent>

Flows of the Immaterium cause an enemy ship to immediately turn 45 or 90 degrees depending on the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g}. If the enemy ship has suffered {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this abrupt turn additionally deals damage equal to <u>(from 25 to 30)</u>% of the ship's missing hull for a 45-degree turn and deals that damage twice for a 90-degree turn.
<indent=5%>Does not affect ships larger than cruisers.</indent>
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

languages.text:
Потоки Имматериума заставляют вражеский корабль повернуться на 45 или 90 градусов в зависимости от его {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}маневренности{/g}. Если целостность корабля повреждена, этот резкий поворот наносит ему {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урон{/g}. При повороте на 45 градусов он составляет <u>(от 25 до 30)</u>% от недостающей целостности корабля, а при повороте на 90 градусов – вдвое больше.
<indent=5%>Не действует на корабли, класс которых превышает крейсерский.</indent>
<indent=5%>Восстановление: случайное, <u>(от 1 до 3)</u> раундов.</indent>

Die Ströme des Immateriums bewirken, dass sich ein feindliches Schiff sofort um 45 oder 90 Grad dreht, je nach {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manövrierbarkeit{/g} des Schiffes. Wenn das feindliche Schiff {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpf{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erlitten hat, fügt diese abrupte Drehung zusätzlich Schaden in Höhe von <u>(von 25 bis 30)</u> % des fehlenden Schiffsrumpfes bei einer 45-Grad-Drehung und den doppelten Schaden bei einer 90-Grad-Drehung zu.
<indent=5%>Wirkt nicht auf Schiffe, die größer als Kreuzer sind.</indent>
<indent=5%>Abklingzeit: <u>(von 1 bis 3)</u> Runden nach dem Zufallsprinzip.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Flows of the Immaterium cause an enemy ship to immediately turn 45 or 90 degrees depending on the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g}. If the enemy ship has suffered {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this abrupt turn additionally deals damage equal to <u>(from 25 to 30)</u>% of the ship's missing hull for a 45-degree turn and deals that damage twice for a 90-degree turn.
<indent=5%>Does not affect ships larger then cruisers.</indent>
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Die Ströme des Immateriums bewirken, dass sich ein gegnerisches Schiff sofort um 45 oder 90 Grad dreht, je nach {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manövrierbarkeit{/g} des Schiffes. Wenn das gegnerische Schiff {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpfschaden{/g} erlitten hat, fügt diese abrupte Drehung zusätzlich Schaden in Höhe von 25-30% des fehlenden Schiffsrumpfes bei einer 45-Grad-Drehung und den doppelten Schaden bei einer 90-Grad-Drehung zu.
<indent=5%>Wirkt nicht auf Schiffe, die größer als Kreuzer sind.</indent>
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g}: 1-3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} nach dem Zufallsprinzip.</indent>

Die Ströme des Immateriums bewirken, dass sich ein feindliches Schiff sofort um 45 oder 90 Grad dreht, je nach {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manövrierbarkeit{/g} des Schiffes. Wenn das feindliche Schiff {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpf{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erlitten hat, fügt diese abrupte Drehung zusätzlich Schaden in Höhe von <u>(von 25 bis 30)</u> % des fehlenden Schiffsrumpfes bei einer 45-Grad-Drehung und den doppelten Schaden bei einer 90-Grad-Drehung zu.
<indent=5%>Wirkt nicht auf Schiffe, die größer als Kreuzer sind.</indent>
<indent=5%>Abklingzeit: <u>(von 1 bis 3)</u> Runden nach dem Zufallsprinzip.</indent>

languages.text:
Sous l'effet des courants de l'Immaterium, un vaisseau ennemi effectue un virage immédiat de 45 ou 90 degrés, selon sa {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manœuvrabilité{/g}. En outre, si la {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}coque{/g} du vaisseau ennemi a subi des {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, ce brusque virage lui inflige un nombre de points de dégâts égal à <u>(de 25 à 30)</u> % de ses points de coque manquants pour un virage à 45 degrés, et le double pour un virage à 90 degrés.
<indent=5%>N'affecte pas les vaisseaux plus grands que les croiseurs.</indent>
<indent=5%>Délai de récupération : <u>(de 1 à 3)</u> rounds (aléatoire).</indent>
languages.original_text:
Flows of the Immaterium cause an enemy ship to immediately turn 45 or 90 degrees depending on the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g}. If the enemy ship has suffered {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this abrupt turn additionally deals damage equal to <u>(from 25 to 30)</u>% of the ship's missing hull for a 45-degree turn and deals that damage twice for a 90-degree turn.
<indent=5%>Does not affect ships larger than cruisers.</indent>
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Sous l'effet des courants de l'Immaterium, un vaisseau ennemi effectue un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}virage{/g} immédiat de 45 ou 90 degrés, selon sa {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manœuvrabilité{/g}. En outre, si la {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}coque{/g} du vaisseau ennemi a subi des dégâts, ce brusque virage lui inflige un nombre de points de dégâts égal à 25 à 30 % de ses points de coque manquants pour un virage à 45 degrés, et le double pour un virage à 90 degrés.
<indent=5%>N'affecte pas les vaisseaux plus grands que les croiseurs.</indent>
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Délai de récupération{/g} : 1 à 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} (aléatoire).</indent>

languages.text:
操纵亚空间的流向，让敌方舰船立即转向。敌舰可能会转向45度或90度，取决于目标舰船的{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}机动性{/g}。如果敌舰已经受到了{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，45度突然转向会额外对敌舰造成舰体伤害，等同于敌舰已损失舰体耐久的<u>25%到30%</u>，90度突然转向会造成双倍伤害。
<indent=5%>此能力对巡洋舰以上的舰船无效。</indent>
<indent=5%>冷却时间：随机<u>一到三轮</u>。</indent>
languages.original_text:
Flows of the Immaterium cause an enemy ship to immediately turn 45 or 90 degrees depending on the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g}. If the enemy ship has suffered {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this abrupt turn additionally deals damage equal to <u>(from 25 to 30)</u>% of the ship's missing hull for a 45-degree turn and deals that damage twice for a 90-degree turn.
<indent=5%>Does not affect ships larger than cruisers.</indent>
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
操纵亚空间的流向，让敌方舰船立即转向。敌舰可能会转向45度或90度，取决于目标舰船的{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}机动性{/g}。如果敌舰已经受到了{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，45度突然转向会额外对敌舰造成舰体伤害，等同于敌舰已损失舰体耐久的<u>25%到30%</u>，90度突然转向会造成双倍伤害。
<indent=5%>此能力对巡洋舰以上的舰船无效。</indent>
<indent=5%>冷却时间：随机<u>一到三轮</u>。</indent>

操纵亚空间的流向，让敌方舰船立即转向。敌舰可能会转向45度或90度，取决于目标舰船的{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}机动性{/g}。如果敌舰已经受到了{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，45度突然转向会额外对敌舰造成舰体伤害，等同于敌舰已损失舰体耐久的<u>25%到30%</u>，90度突然转向会造成双倍伤害。
<indent=5%>此能力对巡洋舰以上的舰船无效。</indent>
<indent=5%>冷却时间：随机<u>一到三轮</u>。</indent>

languages.text:
El flujo del Inmaterio hace que una nave enemiga gire inmediatamente entre 45 y 90 grados dependiendo de la {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}maniobrabilidad{/g} de la nave. Si la nave ha sufrido {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} en el {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}casco{/g}, este giro tan brusco además inflige daño igual a <u>(de 25 a 30)</u> % del casco perdido por la nave si el giro es de 45 grados y el doble si es de 90 grados.
<indent=5%>No afecta a naves más grandes que un crucero.</indent>
<indent=5%>Tiempo de recuperación: <u>(de 1 a 3)</u> asaltos aleatoriamente.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Flows of the Immaterium cause an enemy ship to immediately turn 45 or 90 degrees depending on the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g}. If the enemy ship has suffered {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this abrupt turn additionally deals damage equal to <u>(from 25 to 30)</u>% of the ship's missing hull for a 45-degree turn and deals that damage twice for a 90-degree turn.
<indent=5%>Does not affect ships larger than cruisers.</indent>
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
El flujo del Inmaterio hace que una nave enemiga gire inmediatamente entre 45 y 90 grados dependiendo de la {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}maniobrabilidad{/g} de la nave.{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}{/g} Si la nave ha sufrido daño en el {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}casco{/g}, este giro tan brusco además inflige daño igual al 25–30 % del casco perdido por la nave si el giro es de 45 grados y el doble si es de 90 grados.
<indent=5%>No afecta a naves más grandes que un crucero.</indent>
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Tiempo de recuperación{/g}: 1–3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}, aleatorio.</indent>

languages.text:
非物質世界の流れが敵船の{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}操縦性{/g}によって、即座に45度または90度旋回させる。もし敵船が{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けている場合、この急旋回は、45度旋回の場合は船体ダメージの<u>25～30%</u>に等しいダメージを与え、90度旋回の場合はそのダメージを2回与える。
<indent=5%>クルーザー以上の大きさの船には無効。</indent>
<indent=5%>クールダウン：ランダムで<u>1～3</u>ラウンド。</indent>
languages.original_text:
Flows of the Immaterium cause an enemy ship to immediately turn 45 or 90 degrees depending on the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g}. If the enemy ship has suffered {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this abrupt turn additionally deals damage equal to <u>(from 25 to 30)</u>% of the ship's missing hull for a 45-degree turn and deals that damage twice for a 90-degree turn.
<indent=5%>Does not affect ships larger than cruisers.</indent>
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
非物質世界の潮流が敵艦を即座に45または90度{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回転{/g}させる（その艦の{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}操縦性{/g}に依存）敵艦が{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体{/g}ダメージを受けている場合、この突発的な旋回により、45度の場合は船体の損傷量の25～30%に相当するダメージを追加で与える。90度の場合はその2倍のダメージを与える。
<indent=5%>巡洋艦以上のサイズの船には影響しない。</indent>
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}：1-3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}（ランダム）</indent>
